Content-Type: text/plain; charset=iso-8859-1
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit

::Grimlock::
   
  Grimlock pilots the shuttle into the air and heads for Atlantis. He decided he liked the behavior and personality of these bots.
   
  Grimlock: Minions hit city with missiles. Lots of em too. Sweep's were everywhere. Maximals were out numbered and out gunned fast. City tore apart bad. Cyclonus and Scourge, leaders, went for Rodimus Prime. Rodimus fought Cyclonus alone on near island. He lose. Cyclonus make somekind of light beam. Take Matrix from Rodimus. Rodimus seem real hurt. Minions all leave then.

Nic <warriorazure@...> wrote:
          The Airtankers follow him and get inside the shuttle. Being fliers
themselves, this obviously bothered them.

Skysword: Screw that shuttle! This is too weird! I'll fly escort outside.

Motherload: You will not do that. The situation clearly seems to call
for all of us intact, so you chew your pretty little comfort or I'll
shove it down your guzzler.

Being so rebuked, Skysword went in a corner to sulk. The three other
Airtankers were not pleased with the decision, but watching Motherload
being as irritable as Skysword about being stuck inside seemed to
convince them.

Lock-on: Grimlock, what did the Minions do during the fight?

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@...> wrote:
>
> ::Grimlock::
> 
> Grimlock: Ok. Me Grimlock take you all to Jotunn. He still at
Atlantis. Come on shuttle or fly if can.
> 
> Grimlock stomps back into the shuttle and transforms to robot
mode. He starts up the shuttle and is preparing for lift off.
> 
> Nic <warriorazure@...> wrote:
> The airtankers all looked at Grimlock with a slack-jawed
air and the
> sense of impending doom they had dreaded. Add to that a touch of
> pessimistic down mood, and that was as accurate a description of their
> sparks as could be.
> 
> Lock-on: Holy sh...
> 
> Motherload: Shut up. THAT wasn't anything I'd expected... Gunrain, is
> this accurate with the activity we've been reported?
> 
> Gunrain: Dam' right 'twas... Ow... That ain't gonna do us no good,
Load...
> 
> Motherload: It won't, but if we keep things like that, we're just
> giving Unicron the keys to get in here and screw everything up.
> Grimlock, take us to Jotunn.



                         

       
---------------------------------
Never miss a thing.   Make Yahoo your homepage.
--0-420448362-1199338976=:70050
